name: Box-O-Zombies The Game
blurb: Rebuild your own city after the zombie apocalypse and defend it from the roaming hordes of undead. Unlock new content with zombie toys!

rewards.reward: JUST GET ME IN THE GAME ALREADY!\r\nFor just a buck we'll include you in the credits AND we'll use your name as one of the random names generated for survivors! (With your permission of course). Every pledge will include this.
JUST A FLESH WOUND Get your hands on a slick background for your iOS device and an MP3 of the main theme music from the game!

A VERY ZOMBIE CHRISTMAS  What better way to spread the Christmas spirit than with your very own Zombie Santa.  Enjoy a digital copy of the game and a fully interactive Zombie Santa, complete with in game content and Christmas goodies!  Whether you've been naughty or nice, this is the perfect way to keep a piece of Christmas undead all year long.

DOES THIS LOOK INFECTED? YOU GET THE FLESH WOUND + BETA ACCESS to the digital game. A full release digital copy of the game AND! your very own "zombie thumb" drive! Too bad this guy lost his thumb because it contains the full game soundtrack, concept art, and more.

ARE YOU SURE THIS DOESN'T LOOK INFECTED? YOU GET THE FLESH WOUND + A digital copy of the game as well your very own "zombie thumb" drive! Too bad this guy lost his thumb because it contains the full game soundtrack, concept art, and more.
WHAT'S IN THE BOX? ALL PREVIOUS TIERS + Get your very own copy of the Box-O-Zombies game complete with NFC reader, NFC enabled figures, and a download code for the full version of the game.

IT'S A GLOBAL EPIDEMIC! Includes ARE YOU SURE THIS DOESN'T LOOK INFECTED? + JUST A FLESH WOUND We're spreading the zombie plague all over the planet! Get your very own copy of the Box-O-Zombies game complete with NFC reader, NFC enabled figures, and a download code for the full version of the game.  We'll also plant you're country's flag as a decorative item in the game!
AMONG THE LIVING. ALL PREVIOUS TIERS + A highly detailed map of the world of Box-O-Zombies in all its 8-bit glory. We'll even set you up with a sweet T-shirt to wear around town.

SURVIVOR.  You'll also get "JUST A FLESH WOUND", "DOES THIS LOOK INFECTED?", "WHAT'S IN THE BOX?", "AMONG THE LIVING" + Want to be a part of the project? We'll write you into the game complete with character bio and in game sprite designed around you!

ONE OF THEM You'll also get "JUST A FLESH WOUND", "DOES THIS LOOK INFECTED?", "WHAT'S IN THE BOX?", "AMONG THE LIVING" + Ok, so maybe just being in the game isn't enough for you either. Maybe you're looking for something a little more substantial. Put yourself in the game and turn yourself into a toy! We'll create specific in game content around you and your zombie likeness. Show off your very own collectible based on your zombified remains. You wont be alone either, you'll get a kickstarter pack of characters including everyone else who got turned into one of them.

ONE OF US  You'll also get "JUST A FLESH WOUND", "DOES THIS LOOK INFECTED?", "WHAT'S IN THE BOX?", "AMONG THE LIVING" + Dead or alive, the choice is yours. We'll make your toy and in game content a part of the solution or a part of the problem. And what better way to see it all come together than at the Box-O-Zombies premier! We'll fly you and a guest out to Chicago to join us all weekend at C2E2 (April 26-28, 2013) where we'll be debuting our game and enjoying all things zombie. If you really want to get to know the dev team, join us at our celebration Friday the 26th. Some restrictions apply (must be in the continental united states, must be 18 or older. Includes air fair and accommodations for 4 days and 3 nights).
